name: Moth&Flame
description:
Cast the light and walk on shadows. With a friend!

Moth has been lost in the terrifying darkness. However, his new friend, Flame, will light a way and cast shadows on which Moth can walk.

A short puzzle platformer adventure to play together with one controller.

The game won 2nd prize at Warsaw Game Jam Pro and was made by Tomasz Dziuba, Krystian Krasowski, Eliza Małecka, Adam Mirkowski, Marcin Wierzchoś
